summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the east one-half of Twentieth Avenue Northeast, from the south line of East Sixty-fifth Street to the south line of University Place Addition to the City of Seattle; Twenty-first Avenue Northeast and Twenty-second Avenue Northeast, each from the south line of East Sixty-fifth Street to the south line of University Place Addition to the City of Seattle; and East Sixty-third Street, from Twentieth Avenue Northeast to Ravenna Avenue, by grading and curbing the same, together with all necessary appurtenances for the drainage of said district, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 33691, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
